scripts.android: npm run build-web && npm run copy-web-android && react-native run-android
scripts.build-android-release-aab: npm run build-web && npm run copy-web-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.build-android-release-apk: npm run build-web && npm run copy-web-android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build-ios-release: npm run build-web && npm run copy-web-ios && cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace MarlinWallet.xcworkspace -scheme MarlinWallet -configuration Release archive -allowProvisioningUpdates
scripts.build-web: pushd web && npm run build && popd
scripts.ios: npm run build-web && npm run copy-web-ios && react-native run-ios
